```{python}
import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

r = np.arange(0, 2, 0.01)
theta = 2 * np.pi * r
fig, ax = plt.subplots(subplot_kw={'projection': 'polar'})
ax.plot(theta, r, label='Spiral')
ax.set_rticks([0.5, 1, 1.5, 2])
ax.set_title("Penguin Style Spiral")
ax.grid(True)
ax.legend()

plt.show()
